trans-unit.source: It was inspired by slumber, but it is dedicated only to Proxmox. It allows not only REST API use over HTTPS, but the same api over ssh and pvesh utility.
trans-unit.target: Se inspiró en el sueño,pero está dedicado sólo a Proxmox.Permite no sólo el uso de la API REST sobre HTTPS,sino también la misma API sobre ssh y la utilidad pvesh.

trans-unit.source: You can also setup API Tokens which allow tighter access controls. API Tokens are also stateless, so they much better for long-lived programs that might have the standard username/password authentication timeout. API tokens can be created through the web UI or through the API.
trans-unit.target: You can also setup API Tokens which allow tighter access controls. API Tokens are also stateless, so they much better for long-lived programs that might have the standard username/password authentication timeout. API tokens can be created through the web UI or through the API.
